channel.title: Is it possible to use parameter in visualization's title?
channel.description:
Hello,
right now I can set a fixed visualization's name in Visualization Editor, say "Campaign".
But is there a possibility to use the same template substitutions as in query? For example, "Campaign {{ CampaignId }}".
Thanks

item.title: Is it possible to use parameter in visualization's title?
item.dc:creator: vishgala
item.description:
Really looking for this feature.

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to use parameter in visualization's title?

item.title: Is it possible to use parameter in visualization's title?

item.description:
Hello,

right now I can set a fixed visualization’s name in Visualization Editor, say “Campaign”.

But is there a possibility to use the same template substitutions as in query?
For example, “Campaign {{ CampaignId }}”.

Thanks
